text: Ludovica Modugno (12 January 1949 â€“ 26 October 2021) was an Italian actress and movie director. Her worked focused on dubbing. Her best known roles were in Cado dalle nubi, Quo vado? and Magical Nights. Modugno died in Rome on 26 October 2021 at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian movie directors Category:Actors from Rome
